00035     Alignment CircularAlignmentFactory::GotohAlignment(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00036         const bpp::Sequence* B, const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00037       {
00038 
00039         double bestScore = 0;
00040         double tempScore = 0;
00041         uint offset = 0;
00042 
00043         ScoreMatrix D;
00044         ScoreMatrix P;
00045         ScoreMatrix Q;
00046 
00047         //#ifdef _OPENMP            
00048         //#pragma omp parallel for shared(offset)
00049         //#endif      
00050         for (uint i=1; i<=A->size(); i++)
00051           {
00052             D = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(A, B, 0);
00053             P = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(A, B, 0);
00054             Q = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(A, B, 0);
00055 
00056             RotatedSequence rotB(B, i);
00057 
00058             AlignmentFactory::ForwardRecursionGotoh(A, &rotB, scoreM, &D, &P, &Q);
00059             tempScore = D.at(D.size()-1).at(D.at(0).size()-1);
00060 
00061             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(tempScore, bestScore) != bestScore)
00062               {
00063                 bestScore = tempScore;
00064                 offset = i;
00065               }
00066 
00067           }
00068         //Stupid but seems the only way
00069         D = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(A, B, 0);
00070         P = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(A, B, 0);
00071         Q = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(A, B, 0);
00072 
00073         RotatedSequence rotB(B, offset);
00074         AlignmentFactory::ForwardRecursionGotoh(A, &rotB, scoreM, &D, &P, &Q);
00075 
00076         uint i = D.size()-1;
00077         uint j = D.at(0).size()-1;
00078 
00079         return BacktrackingGotohGlobal(A, &rotB, scoreM, &D, &P, &Q, i, j);
00080 
00081       }
00082 
00083     Alignment CircularAlignmentFactory::NeedlemanWunschAlignment(
00084         const bpp::Sequence* A, const bpp::Sequence* B,
00085         const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00086       {
00087 
00088         double bestScore = 0;
00089         double tempScore = 0;
00090         uint offset = 0;
00091 
00092         ScoreMatrix D;
00093 
00094         //#ifdef _OPENMP            
00095         //#pragma omp parallel for shared(offset)
00096         //#endif      
00097         for (uint i=1; i<=A->size(); i++)
00098           {
00099             D = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(A, B, 0);
00100 
00101             RotatedSequence rotB(B, i);
00102 
00103             AlignmentFactory::ForwardRecursionNMW(A, &rotB, scoreM, &D);
00104             tempScore = D.at(D.size()-1).at(D.at(0).size()-1);
00105 
00106             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(tempScore, bestScore) != bestScore)
00107               {
00108                 bestScore = tempScore;
00109                 offset = i;
00110               }
00111 
00112           }
00113         //Stupid but seems the only way
00114         D = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(A, B, 0);
00115 
00116         RotatedSequence rotB(B, offset);
00117         AlignmentFactory::ForwardRecursionNMW(A, &rotB, scoreM, &D);
00118 
00119         uint i = D.size()-1;
00120         uint j = D.at(0).size()-1;
00121 
00122         return BacktrackingNMW(A, &rotB, scoreM, &D, i, j);
00123 
00124       }
